name: Ramzi Benmansour
summary: Passionate junior developer with experience in web and mobile development. Skilled in various programming languages and technologies, including C, C++, Java, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Angular. Excited to work on challenging projects and contribute to innovative solutions.

projects.name: Star Wars Single Page Application (Angular)
projects.description: Conception and development of a key application for the Rebel Alliance, managing pilots, fighters, and assignments.

projects.name: Miamle (Java EE, MySQL)
projects.description: Conception and development of a user-friendly Spanish hostel management web application, emphasizing registration, participation, and event management.

projects.name: GEN QUIZ (React + Node.js)
projects.description: Web application in React for creating, playing, and sharing interactive quizzes. User management, scores, and quiz categories.

projects.name: BlackJack (Python)
projects.description: Development of a Python application offering an immersive gaming experience with authentic rules and a user-friendly interface.
